ssl_info.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'ssl_info' ('id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,'group_id' INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,'hash' TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,'path' TEXT NOT NULL,'dns' TEXT NOT NULL,'subject' TEXT NOT NULL,'info' TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '','cloud_id' INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT -1,'not_after' TEXT NOT NULL,'use_for_panel' INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,'use_for_site' TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '[]','auth_info' TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}','create_time' INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT (strftime('%s')), 'ps' TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '');

config.sql:
CREATE TABLE `config` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `webserver` TEXT,
  `backup_path` TEXT,
  `sites_path` TEXT,
  `status` INTEGER,
  `mysql_root` TEXT
)

users.sql:
CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `username` TEXT,
  `password` TEXT,
  `login_ip` TEXT,
  `login_time` TEXT,
  `phone` TEXT,
  `email` TEXT,
  `salt` TEXT
)

sites.sql:
CREATE TABLE `sites` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `name` TEXT,
  `path` TEXT,
  `status` TEXT,
  `index` TEXT,
  `ps` TEXT,
  `addtime` TEXT,
  `type_id` integer DEFAULT 0,
  `edate` integer DEFAULT '0000-00-00',
  `project_type` STRING DEFAULT 'PHP',
  `project_config` STRING DEFAULT '{}',
  `rname` text DEFAULT '',
 `stop` text DEFAULT ''
)

site_types.sql:
CREATE TABLE `site_types` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `name` REAL,
  `ps` REAL
)

domain.sql:
CREATE TABLE `domain` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `pid` INTEGER,
  `name` TEXT,
  `port` INTEGER,
  `addtime` TEXT
)

binding.sql:
CREATE TABLE `binding` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `pid` INTEGER,
  `domain` TEXT,
  `path` TEXT,
  `port` INTEGER,
  `addtime` TEXT
)

app_package.sql:
CREATE TABLE `app_package` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `pid` INTEGER,
  `site_name` TEXT,
  `app_name` TEXT,
  `app_version` TEXT,
  `package_name` TEXT,
  `package_path` TEXT,
  `size` TEXT,
  `addtime` TEXT,
  `update_log` TEXT,
  `php_versions` TEXT,
  `php_libs` TEXT,
  `php_functions` TEXT,
  `mysql_versions` TEXT,
  `db_character` TEXT,
  `init_sql` TEXT,
  `db_config_file` TEXT
)

app_package_upload.sql:
CREATE TABLE `app_package_upload` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `app_name` TEXT,
  `app_version` TEXT,
  `package_path` TEXT,
  `size` TEXT,
  `addtime` TEXT,
  `update_log` TEXT,
  `php_versions` TEXT,
  `php_libs` TEXT,
  `php_functions` TEXT,
  `mysql_versions` TEXT,
  `db_character` TEXT,
  `init_sql` TEXT,
  `db_config_file` TEXT
)

ftps.sql:
CREATE TABLE `ftps` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `pid` INTEGER,
  `name` TEXT,
  `password` TEXT,
  `path` TEXT,
  `status` TEXT,
  `ps` TEXT,
  `addtime` TEXT,
 `type_id` INTEGER
)

database_servers.sql:
CREATE TABLE `database_servers` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `db_host` REAL,
  `db_port` REAL,
  `db_user` INTEGER,
  `db_password` INTEGER,
  `ps` REAL,
  `addtime` INTEGER,
  `db_type` REAL DEFAULT 'mysql',
  `type` STRING DEFAULT 'MySQL'
 )

databases.sql:
CREATE TABLE `databases` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `pid` INTEGER,
  `name` TEXT,
  `username` TEXT,
  `password` TEXT,
  `accept` TEXT,
  `ps` TEXT,
  `addtime` TEXT,
  `db_type` integer DEFAULT '0',
  `conn_config` STRING DEFAULT '{}',
  `sid` integer DEFAULT 0,
  `type` TEXT DEFAULT 'MySQL',
 `type_id` INTEGER
)

mysql_increment_settings.sql:
CREATE TABLE `mysql_increment_settings` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `cron_id` INTEGER,
  `db_name` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `tb_name` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `zip_password` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `last_backup_time` TEXT DEFAULT ''
)

mysql_increment_backup.sql:
CREATE TABLE `mysql_increment_backup` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `cron_id` INTEGER,
  `size` INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  `type` INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  `addtime` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `name` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `localhost` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `ftp` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `alioss` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `txcos` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `qiniu` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `aws_s3` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `upyun` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `obs` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `bos` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `gcloud_storage` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `gdrive` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `msonedrive` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `jdcloud` TEXT DEFAULT '',
 `tianyiyun` TEXT DEFAULT '',
 `webdav` TEXT DEFAULT '',
 `minio` TEXT DEFAULT '',
 `dogecloud` TEXT DEFAULT ''
)

dk_container_remark.sql:
CREATE TABLE `dk_container_remark` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `container_id` TEXT,
  `container_name` TEXT,
  `remark` TEXT,
  `addtime` TEXT
)

dk_sites.sql:
CREATE TABLE `dk_sites` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `name` TEXT,
  `path` TEXT,
  `status` TEXT DEFAULT 1,
  `ps` TEXT,
  `addtime` TEXT,
  `type_id` integer DEFAULT 111,
  `edate` integer DEFAULT '0000-00-00',
  `project_type` STRING DEFAULT 'dk_proxy',
  `container_id` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `container_name` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `container_port` TEXT DEFAULT ''
)

dk_domain.sql:
CREATE TABLE `dk_domain` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `pid` INTEGER,
  `name` TEXT,
  `addtime` TEXT
)

dk_backup.sql:
CREATE TABLE `dk_backup` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `type` INTEGER,
  `name` TEXT,
  `container_id` TEXT,
  `container_name` TEXT,
  `filename` TEXT,
  `size` INTEGER,
  `addtime` TEXT,
`ps` STRING DEFAULT '无',
`cron_id` INTEGER DEFAULT 0
)

cpu_stats.sql:
CREATE TABLE `cpu_stats` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `time` INTEGER, 
  `cpu_usage` VARCHAR,
  `online_cpus` INT,
  `container_id` VARCHAR
);

io_stats.sql:
CREATE TABLE `io_stats` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `container_id` VARCHAR,
  `time` VARCHAR,
  `read_total` INTEGER,
  `write_total` INTEGER
);

mem_stats.sql:
CREATE TABLE `mem_stats` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `mem_limit` VARCHAR,
  `cache` VARCHAR,
  `usage` VARCHAR,
  `usage_total` VARCHAR,
  `container_id` VARCHAR,
  `time` INTEGER
);

net_stats.sql:
CREATE TABLE `net_stats` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `container_id` INTEGER,
  `rx_total` INTEGER,
  `tx_total` INTEGER,
  `rx` INTEGER,
  `tx` INTEGER,
  `time` VARCHAR
);

registry.sql:
CREATE TABLE `registry` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `url` VARCHAR,
  `username` VARCHAR DEFAULT (''),
  `password` VARCHAR DEFAULT (''),
  `name` VARCHAR,
  `namespace` VARCHAR,
  `remark` VARCHAR DEFAULT (''),
  `reg_name` VARCHAR DEFAULT ('')
);

stacks.sql:
CREATE TABLE `stacks` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `name` VARCHAR UNIQUE,
  `status` VARCHAR,
  `path` VARCHAR,
  `template_id` INTEGER,
  `time` INTEGER,
  `remark` VARCHAR DEFAULT ('')
);

templates.sql:
CREATE TABLE `templates` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `path` VARCHAR,
  `name` VARCHAR UNIQUE,
  `remark` VARCHAR DEFAULT (''),
  `add_in_path` INTEGER
);

firewall.sql:
CREATE TABLE `firewall` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `port` TEXT,
  `ps` TEXT,
  `addtime` TEXT
)

firewall_country.sql:
CREATE TABLE `firewall_country` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `types` TEXT,
  `country` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `brief` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `addtime` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `ports` TEXT DEFAULT ''
)

firewall_domain.sql:
CREATE TABLE `firewall_domain` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `types` TEXT,
  `domain` TEXT,
  `domain_total` TEXT,
  `port` TEXT,
  `sid` int DEFAULT 0,
  `address` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `brief` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `protocol` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `addtime` TEXT DEFAULT ''
)

firewall_ip.sql:
CREATE TABLE `firewall_ip` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `types` TEXT,
  `address` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `brief` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `addtime` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `sid`  int DEFAULT 0,
  `domain` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `chain` TEXT DEFAULT ''
)

firewall_new.sql:
CREATE TABLE `firewall_new` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `protocol` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `ports` TEXT,
  `types` TEXT,
  `address` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `brief` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `addtime` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `domain` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `sid`  int DEFAULT 0,
  `chain` TEXT DEFAULT ''
)

firewall_trans.sql:
CREATE TABLE `firewall_trans` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `start_port` TEXT,
  `ended_ip` TEXT,
  `ended_port` TEXT,
  `protocol` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `addtime` TEXT DEFAULT ''
)

firewall_forward.sql:
CREATE TABLE `firewall_forward` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `S_Address` TEXT,
  `S_Domain` TEXT,
  `S_Port` TEXT,
  `T_Address` TEXT,
  `T_Domain` TEXT,
  `T_Port` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `Protocol` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `Family` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `addtime` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `brief` TEXT DEFAULT ''
)

logs.sql:
CREATE TABLE `logs` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `type` TEXT,
  `log` TEXT,
  `addtime` TEXT,
  `uid` integer DEFAULT '1',
  `username` TEXT DEFAULT 'system'
)

crontab.sql:
CREATE TABLE "crontab" (
  "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  "name" TEXT,
  "type" TEXT,
  "where1" TEXT,
  "where_hour" INTEGER,
  "where_minute" INTEGER,
  "echo" TEXT,
  "addtime" TEXT,
  "status" INTEGER DEFAULT 1,
  "save" INTEGER DEFAULT 3,
  "backupTo" TEXT DEFAULT off,
  "sName" TEXT,
  "sBody" TEXT,
  "sType" TEXT,
  "urladdress" TEXT,
  "save_local" INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  "notice" INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  "notice_channel" TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `db_type` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `split_type` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `split_value` INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  `rname` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `type_id` INTEGER,
 `backup_mode` TEXT,
 `db_backup_path` TEXT,
 `time_type` TEXT,
 `special_time` TEXT,
 `flock` INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
 `post_param` TEXT,
 `log_cut_path` TEXT,
 `user_agent` TEXT,
 `version` TEXT,
 `table_list` TEXT,
 `time_set` TEXT,
 `keyword` TEXT,
 `result` INTEGER DEFAULT 1,
 `second` TEXT 
 )

crontab_types.sql:
CREATE TABLE "crontab_types" (
  "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  "name" VARCHAR DEFAULT '',
  "ps"  VARCHAR DEFAULT ''
 )

backup.sql:
CREATE TABLE `backup` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `type` INTEGER,
  `name` TEXT,
  `pid` INTEGER,
  `filename` TEXT,
  `size` INTEGER,
  `addtime` TEXT,
	`ps` STRING DEFAULT '无',
	`cron_id` INTEGER DEFAULT 0
)

boce_task.sql:
CREATE TABLE `boce_task` (
  `id`      INTEGER      PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `name`    STRING (64),
  `url`     STRING (128),
  `status`  INTEGER,
  `channel` STRING (128),
  `cycle`   INTEGER default 10,
  `addtime` INTEGER default 0,
  `address` STRING (128) default 'localhost',
  `keyword` STRING (128) default '',
  `status_code` BOOLEAN default 0,
  `delay` INTEGER default 0,
  `similarity` TEXT default '',
  `size` INTEGER default 0,
  `sensitive` BOOLEAN default 0,
  `alarm_count` integer default -1
)

boce_list.sql:
CREATE TABLE `boce_list` (
  `id`      INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `pid`     INTEGER,
  `data`    TEXT,
  `status`  INTEGER,
  `addtime` INTEGER
)

task_list.sql:
CREATE TABLE `task_list` (
  `id`              INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `name` 			TEXT,
  `type`			TEXT,
  `status` 			INTEGER,
  `shell` 			TEXT,
  `other`           TEXT,
  `exectime` 	  	INTEGER,
  `endtime` 	  	INTEGER,
  `addtime`			INTEGER
)

tasks.sql:
CREATE TABLE `tasks` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `name` 			TEXT,
  `type`			TEXT,
  `status` 		TEXT,
  `addtime` 	TEXT,
  `start` 	  INTEGER,
  `end` 	    INTEGER,
  `execstr` 	TEXT
)

div_list.sql:
CREATE TABLE `div_list` (
`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
`div` TEXT
)

download_token.sql:
CREATE TABLE `download_token` (
`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
`token` REAL,
`filename` REAL,
`total` INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
`expire` INTEGER,
`password` REAL,
`ps` REAL,
`addtime` INTEGER
)

messages.sql:
CREATE TABLE `messages` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `level` TEXT,
  `msg` TEXT,
  `state` INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  `expire` INTEGER,
  `addtime` INTEGER,
  `send` integer DEFAULT 0,
  `retry_num` integer DEFAULT 0
)

temp_login.sql:
CREATE TABLE `temp_login` (
`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
`token` REAL,
`salt` REAL,
`state` INTEGER,
`login_time` INTEGER,
`login_addr` REAL,
`logout_time` INTEGER,
`expire` INTEGER,
`addtime` INTEGER
)

security.sql:
CREATE TABLE `security` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `type` TEXT,
  `log` TEXT,
  `addtime` INTEGER DEFAULT 0
)

send_msg.sql:

  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `name` TEXT,
  `send_type` TEXT,
  `msg` TEXT,
  `is_send` TEXT,
  `type` TEXT,
  `inser_time` TEXT DEFAULT ''
)

send_settings.sql:
CREATE TABLE `send_settings` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `name` TEXT,
  `type` TEXT,
  `path` TEXT,
  `send_type` TEXT,
  `last_time` TEXT,
  `time_frame` TEXT,
  `inser_time` TEXT DEFAULT''
)

ssh_login_record.sql:
CREATE TABLE `ssh_login_record` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `addr` TEXT,
  `server_ip` TEXT,
  `user_agent` TEXT,
  `ssh_user` TEXT,
  `login_time` INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  `close_time` INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  `video_addr` TEXT
)

rsync_oss.sql:
CREATE TABLE `rsync_oss` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `rsync_path` DEFAULT '',
  `rsync_name` DEFAULT '',
  `all_num` INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  `rsync_num` INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  `recycle_bin` DEFAULT '',
  `where_1` DEFAULT '',
  `where_2` DEFAULT '',
  `webdav` DEFAULT '',
  `ftp` DEFAULT '',
  `alioss` DEFAULT '',
  `txcos` DEFAULT '',
  `qiniu` DEFAULT '',
  `aws` DEFAULT '',
  `upyun` DEFAULT '',
  `obs` DEFAULT '',
  `bos` DEFAULT '',
  `gcloud_storage` DEFAULT '',   
  `gdrive` DEFAULT '',
  `notice` DEFAULT '',
  `notice_channel` DEFAULT '',
  `rsync_status` DEFAULT '',
  `rsync_cycle` DEFAULT '',
  `last_time` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `rsync_mode` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `is_del` TEXT DEFAULT '',
  `add_time` DEFAULT ''
)

panel_search_log.sql:
CREATE TABLE `panel_search_log` (
  `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  `rtext` TEXT,
  `exts` TEXT,
  `path` TEXT,
  `mode` TEXT,
  `isword` TEXT,
  `iscase` TEXT,
  `noword` TEXT,
  `backup_path` TEXT,
  `time` TEXT
)

client_info.sql:
CREATE TABLE client_info (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            remote_addr VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
            remote_port INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
            session_id VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
            user_agent TEXT NOT NULL,
            login_time  INTEGER DEFAULT 0
        )

operator_where.sql:
CREATE TABLE operator_where (
    where_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    trigger_id INTEGER,
    operator VARCHAR,
    op_value VARCHAR,
    args VARCHAR,
    run_script_id INTEGER,
    run_script TEXT,
    create_time INTEGER DEFAULT (0)
)

scripts.sql:
CREATE TABLE scripts (
    script_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    type_id INTEGER DEFAULT (0), is_baota INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    name VARCHAR, status INTEGER DEFAULT (1),
    author VARCHAR, script TEXT,
    version VARCHAR,
    return_type VARCHAR DEFAULT string,
    is_args INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    script_type INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    ps VARCHAR,
    create_time INTEGER DEFAULT (0)
, 'args_title' VARCHAR, 'args_ps' VARCHAR)

trigger.sql:
CREATE TABLE "trigger" (
    trigger_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name VARCHAR,
    status INTEGER DEFAULT (1),
    script_id INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    script_body TEXT,
    cycle_type VARCHAR,
    cycle_where VARCHAR,
    cycle_hour INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    cycle_minute INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    ps VARCHAR,
    create_time INTEGER DEFAULT (0)
, 'args' VARCHAR)

types.sql:
CREATE TABLE types (
    type_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name VARCHAR, title VARCHAR
)

tasks.sql:
CREATE TABLE tasks (
    log_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    script_id INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    trigger_id INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    where_id INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    status INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    result_succ VARCHAR,
    result_err VARCHAR,
    start_time INTEGER DEFAULT (0),
    end_time INTEGER DEFAULT (0)
)
